modules.name: Button
modules.description: Press a button to output a trigger, gate or flip-flop signal

modules.name: Bias/Semitone
modules.description: Offset an incoming voltage by volts or semitones

modules.name: Pulse Generator
modules.description: Generate rectangular pulses with a given duration

modules.name: Teleport In
modules.description: Send signals wirelessly to one or more Teleport Out modules

modules.name: Teleport Out
modules.description: Receive signals wirelessly from a Teleport In module
